meanings.definition: To fall or drop straight down at a high speed.
meanings.sent1: The bird plummeted from the sky.
meanings.sent2: The price of the toy plummeted after the sale.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel plummeted down the tree in search of nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her heart plummeted when she heard the bad news.
meanings.sent5: The rock plummeted into the deep, dark water.

meanings.sent1: The temperature plummeted as the sun set.
meanings.sent2: The attendance at the event plummeted due to the rain.
meanings.sent3: His excitement plummeted when he realized he forgot his wallet.
meanings.sent4: The morale of the team plummeted after the loss.
meanings.sent5: The value of the stock plummeted overnight.
